Key.Chinese: 嘿，是我啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，是我啊。

Key.Original: Ahuh - next job - some truck hit an AT mine yesterday. Little ways out from here. I said we'd check up on it.
Key.Chinese: 啊，下一件工作——一些卡車昨天壓中了反坦克雷。離這兒不遠。我說我們打算去看看。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，下一件工作——一些卡车昨天压中了反坦克雷。离这儿不远。我说我们打算去看看。

Key.Original: Yeah, you too. Bye, Kate.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，你也一樣。拜拜，凱特。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，你也一样。拜拜，凯特。

Key.Original: Hello - did I hear correctly? You're on the move?
Key.Chinese: 你好?我聽的沒錯吧?你們正在移動?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好?我听的没错吧?你们正在移动?

Key.Original: Okay. I'll not keep you. Thanks again - and good luck out there, Nathan. Take care.
Key.Chinese: 好。我不會浪費你太久時間。再次謝謝你——祝你在那邊好運，內森。小心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。我不会浪费你太久时间。再次谢谢你——祝你在那边好运，内森。小心。

Container.name: 011_eve_outro_1
Container.situation: player clears all explosives.

Key.Original: What? I'm not sleeping. What? What's up? We done here?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼了?我沒睡著。什麼?怎麼了?我們完事兒了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么了?我没睡着。什么?怎么了?我们完事儿了?

Key.Original: Alright, Mac. I'll get us packed up.
Key.Chinese: 好的，麥克。那我收拾一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，麦克。那我收拾一下。

Key.Original: Andy. You there?
Key.Chinese: 安迪。你在聽嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 安迪。你在听吗?

Key.Original: Yeah. I'll meet you by the van in five.
Key.Chinese: 好。我5分鐘內到麵包車那裡找你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。我5分钟内到面包车那里找你。

Key.Original: Only if it's not too much effort, sleeping beauty.
Key.Chinese: 只要你那邊不費太多事情的話，"睡美人"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只要你那边不费太多事情的话，"睡美人"。

Container.name: 010_ta_after_credits
Container.situation: a task is assigned. player can still go and find fragments, so journo is still around.

Key.Original: Oh, right, yeah. The mines. I've still got work to do here.
Key.Chinese: 哦，好吧，好。地雷。我在這兒還有工作呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，好吧，好。地雷。我在这儿还有工作呢。

Key.Original: I don't mind talking. Maybe I can tell you a bit more about the town...
Key.Chinese: 我不介意談談。或許我還能跟你再講講村鎮的事...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不介意谈谈。或许我还能跟你再讲讲村镇的事...

Key.Original: Of course. Okay, well, thanks again - for everything. Should I let you get on or...?
Key.Chinese: 當然。好，嗯，再次謝謝你——關於全部的事。我是應該讓你去幹活兒還是...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然。好，嗯，再次谢谢你——关于全部的事。我是应该让你去干活儿还是...?

Container.name: 009_credits
Container.situation: ambience of a busy newsroom. the sound of typing. muffled fragments of speech between editor and journalist.

Key.Original: I'd still lead with the statistic, Kate. That's your hook.
Key.Chinese: 我還是希望有統計數字，凱特。那是你的文鉤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我还是希望有统计数字，凯特。那是你的文钩。

Key.Original: Sounds legit.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來可以。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来可以。

Key.Original: I'd cut that sentence on the scars though. Sounds too, uh, anatonomical? Show, don't tell - remember?
Key.Chinese: 我要把關於傷疤的這句話刪掉。聽起來太...嗯，細節了?要展示，不要講述——記得吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我要把关于伤疤的这句话删掉。听起来太...嗯，细节了?要展示，不要讲述——记得吧?

Key.Original: Mm. Okay... and using the mines as a metaphor, there... buried and forgotten. Thoughts?
Key.Chinese: 嗯。好的...用地雷作為隱喻，在這兒...被埋下，被忘卻。想法呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。好的...用地雷作为隐喻，在这儿...被埋下，被忘却。想法呢?

Key.Original: Marine Corps.
Key.Chinese: 海軍陸戰隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 海军陆战队。

Key.Original: And our angle...?
Key.Chinese: 那我們的角度呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那我们的角度呢?

Key.Original: Right. And here... US Marine Corps. Not USMC?
Key.Chinese: 好的。還有這裡..."美國海軍陸戰隊"。不簡寫為"美陸戰隊"嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。还有这里..."美国海军陆战队"。不简写为"美陆战队"吗?

Key.Original: No sword of Damocles, please. Remember, we're creating a space - defining the boundaries. Let our readers fill in the gaps.
Key.Chinese: 別提達摩克裡斯之劍那套，拜託了。記住，我們在創造空間——定義邊界。讓我們的主編們填補空隙吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别提达摩克里斯之剑那套，拜托了。记住，我们在创造空间——定义边界。让我们的主编们填补空隙吧。

Key.Original: Perfect. Think about the pull-quotes - I'll be back in ten - gotta tell Bartleby his story's spiked.
Key.Chinese: 完美。想想副標題式引文——我10分鐘內回來——得跟巴特勒比談談他的文章太尖銳了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完美。想想副标题式引文——我10分钟内回来——得跟巴特勒比谈谈他的文章太尖锐了。

Key.Original: Last paragraph... I moved it down a bit. Figured you'd want to conclude on that.
Key.Chinese: 最後一段...我把它又往下挪了挪。我覺得你可能想這麼結尾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最后一段...我把它又往下挪了挪。我觉得你可能想这么结尾。

Key.Original: Thanks, Karl.
Key.Chinese: 謝謝，卡爾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢，卡尔。

Container.name: 008_ta_article
Container.situation: another optional dialogue from the journalist, before reading the article. may not be used if it ends up feeling awkward.

Key.Original: Hey, Nathan. I have a link for you. It's to my article. Be gentle - it's a draft. My editor's running it by legal as we speak...
Key.Chinese: 嘿，內森。我給你發了個鏈接。這是我的文章。別太在意細節——這只是草稿。我的編輯此時正在批閱呢...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，内森。我给你发了个链接。这是我的文章。别太在意细节——这只是草稿。我的编辑此时正在批阅呢...

Container.name: 007_ta_before_article
Container.situation: optional reponse from the journalist to the answer, before reading the article. may not be used, and rather go to credits.

Key.Original: It's nothing. Hope it helps. I'll be looking forward to reading your article. Best of luck with it, Kate.
Key.Chinese: 沒什麼。希望這能幫上忙。我會期待讀你的文章的。祝你好運，凱特。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没什么。希望这能帮上忙。我会期待读你的文章的。祝你好运，凯特。

Key.Original: Thanks for being honest.
Key.Chinese: 謝謝你如此誠實。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢你如此诚实。

Key.Original: What you say? It makes sense. Everyone will have their own view, but, it's helpful to see your perspective.
Key.Chinese: 怎麼講?這說的有道理。每個人都有自己的觀點，而，看到你的觀點也很有價值。
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么讲?这说的有道理。每个人都有自己的观点，而，看到你的观点也很有价值。

Key.Original: And, Nathan? All this information? It's a godsend. You've given me loads to work with here.
Key.Chinese: 還有，內森?關於這些信息?簡直是天助我也。你真幫了我很大的忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，内森?关于这些信息?简直是天助我也。你真帮了我很大的忙。

Container.name: 006_eve_choice_e_this_is_war
Container.situation: choice e. player doesn't blame anyone, instead putting fault to the war itself. followed immediately by credits.

Key.Original: I'd have to say - y'know, I'm not sure.
Key.Chinese: 我得說——你知道，我也不能確定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得说——你知道，我也不能确定。

Key.Original: I mean, I don't think it's quite so 'black and white'. It's more... black and grey. Hell, grey and grey, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 我是說，我不覺得這事有那麼"黑白分明"。更應該說是...黑與灰。好吧，灰與灰，懂吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，我不觉得这事有那么"黑白分明"。更应该说是...黑与灰。好吧，灰与灰，懂吧?

Key.Original: No one side can be held accountable for the bloodshed here. No one action got us where we are now.
Key.Chinese: 沒有任何一方能夠承擔這些慘案的全部責任。不是任何一方的行為導致了現在我們面對的狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有任何一方能够承担这些惨案的全部责任。不是任何一方的行为导致了现在我们面对的状况。

Key.Original: I dunno. What can we do? Just... double-down on our efforts. Heal the wounds...
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。我又能怎麼做?只能...加緊工作。治癒傷口...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。我又能怎么做?只能...加紧工作。治愈伤口...

Key.Original: And the folks here in Oreokastro? They're the ones that've suffered. This is the reality. This is war.
Key.Chinese: 至於在奧雷奧卡斯特羅的這些人呢?他們才是受害者。這就是真相。這就是戰爭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于在奥雷奥卡斯特罗的这些人呢?他们才是受害者。这就是真相。这就是战争。

Container.name: 005_eve_choice_d_aaf
Container.situation: choice d. player blames aaf for the situation. followed immediately by credits.

Key.Original: I'd have to say The Altis Armed Forces.
Key.Chinese: 我覺得應該是阿爾蒂斯武裝力量。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我觉得应该是阿尔蒂斯武装力量。

Key.Original: I mean, they wanted to wipe Oreokastro off the map - to make an example of it, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 我是說，他們想把奧雷奧卡斯特羅從地圖上抹去——以儆傚尤，懂吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，他们想把奥雷奥卡斯特罗从地图上抹去——以儆效尤，懂吧?

Key.Original: It's one thing fighting against a resistance - it's another to make the civilian population pay for it.
Key.Chinese: 打擊反抗組織是一回事——讓平民為此付出代價是另一回事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 打击反抗组织是一回事——让平民为此付出代价是另一回事。

Key.Original: I dunno. As they clung on to power, they wound up scarring the very country they'd pledged to protect...
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。在他們奪取權力之後。他們最終開始給他們宣誓保護的這個國家製造傷痛...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。在他们夺取权力之后。他们最终开始给他们宣誓保护的这个国家制造伤痛...

Key.Original: And the folks here in Oreokastro? They're the ones that've suffered. They're the ones left to face the remnants of war.
Key.Chinese: 至於奧雷奧卡斯特羅的人呢?他們才是受害者。他們才是被留下來面對戰爭遺留品的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于奥雷奥卡斯特罗的人呢?他们才是受害者。他们才是被留下来面对战争遗留品的人。

Container.name: 004_eve_choice_c_csat
Container.situation: choice c. player blames csat for the situation. followed immediately by credits.

Key.Original: I'd have to say CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 我得說是廣協同盟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得说是广协。

Key.Original: I mean, before they stepped in - pushed NATO out? There was a ceasefire in place, albeit a delicate one, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，在他們介入——趕走北約之前?當時還有停火協議，雖然仍然處於意向階段，你知道吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，在他们介入——赶走北约之前?当时还有停火协议，虽然仍然处于意向阶段，你知道吧?

Key.Original: And that cluster strike? It took the whole thing to the brink - and with so little to gain from such a terrifying show of force.
Key.Chinese: 而這次集束炸彈空襲呢?它把一切都毀掉了——而從這樣可怖的武力展示中根本取得不了什麼進展。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而这次集束炸弹空袭呢?它把一切都毁掉了——而从这样可怖的武力展示中根本取得不了什么进展。

Key.Original: I dunno. The whole thing's felt like a power-play from the get-go. One big pissing contest. It always is...
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。整個事情從一開始就像是一場強權對決。真是扯淡至極。總是這樣...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。整个事情从一开始就像是一场强权对决。真是扯淡至极。总是这样...

Key.Original: And the folks here in Oreokastro? They're the ones that've suffered. They're the ones left to face the remnants of war.
Key.Chinese: 至於奧雷奧卡斯特羅的人呢?他們才是受害者。他們才是被留下來面對戰爭遺留品的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于奥雷奥卡斯特罗的人呢?他们才是受害者。他们才是被留下来面对战争遗留品的人。

Container.name: 003_eve_choice_b_fia
Container.situation: choice b. player blames fia for the situation. followed immediately by credits.

Key.Original: I'd have to say the guerrillas.
Key.Chinese: 我得說是游擊隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得说是游击队。

Key.Original: I mean, without them? There'd be no conflict, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，如果沒有他們的話?就根本不會有衝突，你懂吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，如果没有他们的话?就根本不会有冲突，你懂吧?

Key.Original: They chose to dig deep into civilian infrastructure. They hid themselves among the population.
Key.Chinese: 他們藏身於民用基建中。他們藏身於一般平民中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们藏身于民用基建中。他们藏身于一般平民中。

Key.Original: I dunno. These guys didn't give a damn about what it cost. They wanted power, and would do anything to get it...
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。這些人才特麼不管代價是什麼呢。他們就是想要權力，願意為此不擇手段...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。这些人才特么不管代价是什么呢。他们就是想要权力，愿意为此不择手段...

Key.Original: And the folks here in Oreokastro? They're the ones that've suffered. They're the ones left to face the remnants of war.
Key.Chinese: 至於奧雷奧卡斯特羅的人呢?他們才是受害者。他們才是被留下來面對戰爭遺留品的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于奥雷奥卡斯特罗的人呢?他们才是受害者。他们才是被留下来面对战争遗留品的人。

Container.name: 002_eve_choice_a_nato
Container.situation: choice a. player blames nato for the situation. followed immediately by credits.

Key.Original: I'd have to say NATO.
Key.Chinese: 我得說是北約。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得说是北约。

Key.Original: I mean, they had the capacity to make a difference, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 我的意識是，他們本有能力改變這一切，你懂吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意识是，他们本有能力改变这一切，你懂吧?

Key.Original: The airdrops were helpful, but it was never enough. And, ultimately? Their invasion caused more bloodshed.
Key.Chinese: 空投的確有幫助，但根本不夠。而最終呢?是他們的入侵導致了慘案。
Key.Chinesesimp: 空投的确有帮助，但根本不够。而最终呢?是他们的入侵导致了惨案。

Key.Original: I dunno. If they'd just had the guts to stay in the first place? A lotta killing could have been avoided...
Key.Chinese: 我不知道，如果他們有膽量最初就留下呢?很多殺戮本可以避免的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道，如果他们有胆量最初就留下呢?很多杀戮本可以避免的...

Key.Original: And the folks here in Oreokastro? They're the ones that've suffered. They're the ones left to face the remnants of war.
Key.Chinese: 至於奧雷奧卡斯特羅的人呢?他們才是受害者。他們才是被留下來面對戰爭遺留品的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于奥雷奥卡斯特罗的人呢?他们才是受害者。他们才是被留下来面对战争遗留品的人。

Container.name: 001_hbi_post_mine_dispenser
Container.situation: player returns to the hub after orange_minedispenser. after this conversation finishes, journalist asks player who he thinks is to blame for what happened to oreokastro.

Key.Original: It's nothing, really.
Key.Chinese: 算不上什麼，真的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 算不上什么，真的。

Key.Original: Sure - fire away.
Key.Chinese: 當然——問吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然——问吧。

Key.Original: Honestly, Nathan, all this information? It's a godsend. You've given me loads to work with here.
Key.Chinese: 實話說，內森，這些信息?簡直是天助我也。你真幫了我很多忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 实话说，内森，这些信息?简直是天助我也。你真帮了我很多忙。

Key.Original: Now, there's just one last question I'd like to ask you. It's subjective, so, take your time.
Key.Chinese: 我現在還有一個問題想問你。這個問題比較主觀，所以，請認真想想。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我现在还有一个问题想问你。这个问题比较主观，所以，请认真想想。

Key.Original: In your opinion, who's most to blame for all the suffering in Oreokastro?
Key.Chinese: 依你所見，哪一方最該為奧雷奧卡斯特羅的苦難負責?
Key.Chinesesimp: 依你所见，哪一方最该为奥雷奥卡斯特罗的苦难负责?

Key.Original: NATO?
Key.Chinese: 北約?
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约?

Key.Original: The guerrillas?
Key.Chinese: 游擊隊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队?

Key.Original: CSAT?
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟?
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协?

Key.Original: The Altis Armed Forces?
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量?
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯武装力量?

Key.Original: Or, I don't know, something else?
Key.Chinese: 或者我也不知道，會是什麼別的東西?
Key.Chinesesimp: 或者我也不知道，会是什么别的东西?

Container.name: 002_eve_church_open
Container.situation: nato soldiers have cleared the churchyard of landmines, opening the next trigger for a mission.

Key.Original: Mac. Got a quick update for ya.
Key.Chinese: 麥克。我得跟你匯報一下狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦克。我得跟你汇报一下状况。

Key.Original: Yeah, so, NATO have bagged and tagged their dead.
Key.Chinese: 沒錯，北約已經打包、登記好了他們的屍體。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错，北约已经打包、登记好了他们的尸体。

Key.Original: Not really. Anyhoo. It's a half-assed job. Still a bunch of landmines around. Worth checking out?
Key.Chinese: 沒有。不管怎麼講。他們只做了一半。還有好多地雷在附近。該去看看吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有。不管怎么讲。他们只做了一半。还有好多地雷在附近。该去看看吧?

Key.Original: I'm listening, bud.
Key.Chinese: 我在聽呢，夥計。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在听呢，伙计。

Key.Original: Jesus, Andy. Anyone ever mention you got a way with words?
Key.Chinese: 天啊，安迪。有人提過你有這麼能說會道嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊，安迪。有人提过你有这么能说会道吗?

Key.Original: Yeah. Thanks, Andy. I'll head up there shortly. See what I can do.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。謝謝，安迪。我現在就過去。看看我能做什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。谢谢，安迪。我现在就过去。看看我能做什么。

Container.name: 001_hbi_post_escape
Container.situation: player returns from a memory to the town in the present.

Key.Original: Yeah. That's right.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。沒事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。没事。

Key.Original: It's funny, I asked Markos the same thing once. He just... looked at me and shrugged.
Key.Chinese: 真好笑，我也問過馬爾科斯相同的問題。他只是...看著我聳了聳肩。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真好笑，我也问过马尔科斯相同的问题。他只是...看着我耸了耸肩。

Key.Original: Nathan, you said that Alexis had been a recruit in the Altis Armed Forces.
Key.Chinese: 內森，你之前說阿雷克西斯曾經是阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的新兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 内森，你之前说阿雷克西斯曾经是阿尔蒂斯武装力量的新兵。

Key.Original: Later on, I heard their father had been killed in the civil war. But, I dunno.
Key.Chinese: 後來我聽說他們的父親在內戰中死了。但我也說不清。
Key.Chinesesimp: 后来我听说他们的父亲在内战中死了。但我也说不清。

Key.Original: So, his decision to leave the army - to join the guerrillas - do you know how that came about?
Key.Chinese: 所以他決定離開軍隊——加入游擊隊——你知道這是為什麼嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以他决定离开军队——加入游击队——你知道这是为什么吗?

Key.Original: Whatever his reasons, Markos seemed to have made peace with the fact he wouldn't change his brother's mind...
Key.Chinese: 不管理由如何，馬爾科斯看起來能接受他無法改變他兄弟想法的事實...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管理由如何，马尔科斯看起来能接受他无法改变他兄弟想法的事实...

Container.name: 005_uxo_disabled
Container.situation: player disables uxo which is blocking the way to a scenario trigger.

Key.Original: You were one sneaky little bastard. Now, what were you hiding upstairs...
Key.Chinese: 你這個小壞蛋。現在讓我看看你在樓上藏了什麼...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你这个小坏蛋。现在让我看看你在楼上藏了什么...

Container.name: 004_eve_mine_disabled
Container.situation: player disables a mine for the first time.

Key.Original: Gotcha.
Key.Chinese: 搞定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞定。

Container.name: 003_ta_toolkit_info
Container.situation: journalist asks the player what he's doing.

Key.Original: Not bad, not bad. Our gear's finally arrived from dispatch.
Key.Chinese: 不壞，不壞。我們的裝備終於抵達了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不坏，不坏。我们的装备终于抵达了。

Key.Original: I can start deactivating mines and leftover ordnance now.
Key.Chinese: 我現在可以開始拆除地雷和遺留爆炸物了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我现在可以开始拆除地雷和遗留爆炸物了。

Key.Original: Hey. How you getting on?
Key.Chinese: 嘿。你現在如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。你现在如何?

Key.Original: Sure do. I crawl up close, identify it, then just, y'know, disarm the thing.
Key.Chinese: 當然。我爬過去，辨識它，然後，就拆掉它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然。我爬过去，辨识它，然后，就拆掉它。

Key.Original: Yeah, well, I may have skipped the part where, y'know, it can explode.
Key.Chinese: 對，好吧，我可能沒提過這東西可能...爆炸的這部分。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对，好吧，我可能没提过这东西可能...爆炸的这部分。

Key.Original: Ah, right. And you do that by hand?
Key.Chinese: 嗯，好的。你是用手做嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好的。你是用手做吗?

Key.Original: I'm sure it's more involved than that.
Key.Chinese: 我相信實際情況比這要更複雜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我相信实际情况比这要更复杂。

Container.name: 002_ta_toolkit_equipped
Container.situation: player picks up the toolkit from a utility drone. the drone flies away.

Key.Original: What's that?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么了?

Key.Original: Okay, little buddy. Sure thing.
Key.Chinese: 好的，小傢伙。沒問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，小家伙。没问题。

Key.Original: Good. Toolkit's here.
Key.Chinese: 好。工具包到手了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。工具包到手了。

Key.Original: See you later, little buddy.
Key.Chinese: 再見了，小傢伙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再见了，小家伙。

Key.Original: Nothing. Just, um, talking to myself.
Key.Chinese: 沒什麼。只是...自言自語。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没什么。只是...自言自语。

Container.name: 001_ta_post_cluster
Container.situation: player returns from a memory to the town in the present.

Key.Original: Hear that...? Sounds like our delivery drone.
Key.Chinese: 聽到了嗎?像是我們的投送無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听到了吗?像是我们的投送无人机。

Key.Original: Just, uh, check the box underneath for the toolkit.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，檢查下面掛的盒子，工具包就在裡面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，检查下面挂的盒子，工具包就在里面。

Key.Original: That was one time! Trust me, you'll be dicking around with landmines soon enough, Mac.
Key.Chinese: 那不就那麼一次嗎!相信我，你很快就可以對付地雷了，麥克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那不就那么一次吗!相信我，你很快就可以对付地雷了，麦克。

Key.Original: I'm on it.
Key.Chinese: 我正在呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我正在呢。

Key.Original: I swear to god, Andy, if it's empty again...
Key.Chinese: 我向老天爺發誓，安迪，如果這次再是空的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我向老天爷发誓，安迪，如果这次再是空的...

Container.name: 025_loc_on_foot_cleared
Container.situation: player approaches the minefield on foot after it has been cleared.

Key.Original: Mac, where're you at?
Key.Chinese: 麥克，你在哪兒呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦克，你在哪儿呢?

Key.Original: Don't make me call your wife, man...
Key.Chinese: 別逼我給你老婆打電話，夥計...
Key.Chinesesimp: 别逼我给你老婆打电话，伙计...

Key.Original: Western minefield... I'm going for a walk - double check we got them all.
Key.Chinese: 西側的雷場...我要走過去看一圈——確認我們把雷排乾淨了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 西侧的雷场...我要走过去看一圈——确认我们把雷排干净了。

Container.name: 024_ex_on_foot_not_cleared
Container.situation: player decides to approach the minefield on foot before it has been cleared.

Key.Original: Depends on how you measure it, buddy.
Key.Chinese: 這取決於你怎麼衡量了，哥們兒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这取决于你怎么衡量了，哥们儿。

Key.Original: Biggest lump of meat? Or the piece that lands the furthest away?
Key.Chinese: 是你最大的一團肉能飛多遠，還是飛得最遠的那塊碎肉能飛多遠?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是你最大的一团肉能飞多远，还是飞得最远的那块碎肉能飞多远?

Key.Original: Hey. This minefield. How far d'you think I'd get if I ran straight through the middle of it?
Key.Chinese: 嘿。這可是雷場。你覺得如果我從中間筆直走過去能到多遠?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。这可是雷场。你觉得如果我从中间笔直走过去能到多远?

Container.name: 023_loc_castle_enter
Container.situation: player flies the drone above the castle. this may or may not occur and depends on player's actions.

Key.Original: Yeah. Lotta guerrillas lost their lives down there.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。很多游擊隊員就死在這兒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。很多游击队员就死在这儿了。

Key.Original: Castle looks empty.
Key.Chinese: 城堡看起來空空如也。
Key.Chinesesimp: 城堡看起来空空如也。

Key.Original: Right. Night of the cluster strike...
Key.Chinese: 沒錯。就在集束炸彈空襲那晚...
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错。就在集束炸弹空袭那晚...

Container.name: 022_loc_church_enter
Container.situation: player flies the drone above the church. this may or may not occur and depends on player's actions.

Key.Original: Careful, Mac. Don't piss off the soldiers. They're collecting their dead, remember?
Key.Chinese: 小心，麥克。別把士兵惹毛了。他們在回收戰友的遺體，記得吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心，麦克。别把士兵惹毛了。他们在回收战友的遗体，记得吧?

Key.Original: Mm. Gotta pretty decent view of the church up here.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。從這兒能看到教堂的好風景。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。从这儿能看到教堂的好风景。

Container.name: 021_eve_building_collapse
Container.situation: cutscene. the guerrilla's one-time armory building collapses. the player is forced out of 'drone view' and there's a loud explosion in the town.

Key.Original: Relax, relax... Sounds like it came from the other side of town.
Key.Chinese: 放鬆，放鬆...聽起來像是鎮另一邊的事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放松，放松...听起来像是镇另一边的事。

Key.Original: You want me to take a look?
Key.Chinese: 你想讓我去看看嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你想让我去看看吗?

Key.Original: What the fuck was that?
Key.Chinese: 那是他媽怎麼回事?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是他妈怎么回事?

Key.Original: Loose masonry, maybe? Just happened to disturb a landmine or something?
Key.Chinese: 磚石鬆動，或許吧?可能碰到了一枚地雷或者什麼的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 砖石松动，或许吧?可能碰到了一枚地雷或者什么的?

Key.Original: No - no, stay put - I'll go.
Key.Chinese: 別別，待在原地。我去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别别，待在原地。我去。

Key.Original: Yeah - maybe.
Key.Chinese: 是啊，可能吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，可能吧。

Container.name: 020_eve_cleared_all
Container.situation: player clears all landmines in the minefield.

Key.Original: Nice work, Big Mac! Bring it home.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好，大麥克!把它帶回家吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，大麦克!把它带回家吧。

Key.Original: Alright. That's it.
Key.Chinese: 好了，完成了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了，完成了。

Container.name: 019_eve_cleared_almost_all
Container.situation: player clears almost all of the landmines.

Key.Original: Alright. Almost done.
Key.Chinese: 好。就快完了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。就快完了。

Container.name: 018_eve_cleared_half
Container.situation: player clears half of the landmines.

Key.Original: How's it going?
Key.Chinese: 進展如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 进展如何?

Key.Original: Getting there.
Key.Chinese: 正在路上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在路上。

Container.name: 017_eve_cleared_first
Container.situation: player clears first landmine.

Key.Original: Five-hundred grams of Crovex water-gel, baby.
Key.Chinese: 500剋剋羅韋克斯水膠炸藥，寶貝兒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 500克克罗韦克斯水胶炸药，宝贝儿。

Key.Original: These demining charges pack quite a punch - what's in them?
Key.Chinese: 排爆炸藥威力好大——裡面裝的什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 排爆炸药威力好大——里面装的什么?

Container.name: 016_eve_rearm
Container.situation: the drone approaches the rearming area.

Key.Original: There you are. Set it down where you started.
Key.Chinese: 給你。開始的時候就把它降下來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 给你。开始的时候就把它降下来。

Key.Original: Over by those white containers.
Key.Chinese: 在那些白色箱子旁邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在那些白色箱子旁边。

Container.name: 015_ex_out_of_ammo_3
Container.situation: the drone is out of ammo again. the driver is surprised by the amount of bombs the eod is using.

Key.Original: Seriously? Nathanial Francis MacDade, how big is this minefield...?
Key.Chinese: 你在搞笑嗎?內森·弗蘭西斯·麥克達德，這片雷場才有多大啊...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在搞笑吗?内森·弗兰西斯·麦克达德，这片雷场才有多大啊...?

Key.Original: Sure thing, Franny Mac. Anyway, you know the drill. Send it back for resupply.
Key.Chinese: 當然了，弗蘭·麥克。不管如何，你知道該怎麼做。把它帶回來重新補給吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然了，弗兰·麦克。不管如何，你知道该怎么做。把它带回来重新补给吧。

Key.Original: Only my mom calls me Francis, Andy.
Key.Chinese: 只有我媽叫我弗蘭西斯，安迪。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只有我妈叫我弗兰西斯，安迪。

Container.name: 014_ex_out_of_ammo_2
Container.situation: the drone is out of ammo again.

Key.Original: No problem, Mac. Same deal.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題，麥克。老方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没问题，麦克。老方法。

Key.Original: Gonna need another resupply.
Key.Chinese: 你需要再補給一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你需要再补给一次。

Container.name: 013_ex_out_of_ammo_1
Container.situation: the drone is out of ammo for the first time.

Key.Original: Don't sweat it. Steer back on over to the van. I'll rearm you.
Key.Chinese: 別擔心。把它飛回麵包車這邊。我來幫你裝彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别担心。把它飞回面包车这边。我来帮你装弹。

Key.Original: I'm out.
Key.Chinese: 我沒彈藥了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没弹药了。

Container.name: 012_eve_drone_fired
Container.situation: the drone drops a demining bomb for the first time.

Key.Original: Having fun there?
Key.Chinese: 玩的如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩的如何?

Key.Original: Making things go boom? You know it!
Key.Chinese: 想炸點東西玩玩?你知道該怎麼做!
Key.Chinesesimp: 想炸点东西玩玩?你知道该怎么做!

Container.name: 011_ex_all_drones_crashed
Container.situation: player crashes the second drone. the mission fails.

Key.Original: Yes, Nathan?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼了，內森?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么了，内森?

Key.Original: Um, Andy?
Key.Chinese: 唔，安迪?
Key.Chinesesimp: 唔，安迪?

Key.Original: Um, never mind...
Key.Chinese: 嗯，別管了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，别管了...

Container.name: 010_ex_drone_crashed
Container.situation: player crashes the first drone.

Key.Original: Sweet lord, give me patience.
Key.Chinese: 老天爺啊，你可行行好吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 老天爷啊，你可行行好吧。

Key.Original: Alright. Let's use the other one - maybe we can say it malfunctioned.
Key.Chinese: 好吧。我們用另一架——或許我們可以說那一架故障了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。我们用另一架——或许我们可以说那一架故障了。

Key.Original: Shit.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Key.Original: I, uh... yeah. I think I just totaled our drone.
Key.Chinese: 我，呃...好吧。我覺得我把你的無人機玩壞了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我，呃...好吧。我觉得我把你的无人机玩坏了。

Container.name: 009_eve_minefield_exit
Container.situation: the drone leaves the southern minefield and the demining bombs are disabled.

Key.Original: Safety's on.
Key.Chinese: 保險打開。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保险打开。

Key.Original: Understood.
Key.Chinese: 明白。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。

Container.name: 008_eve_drone_detector
Container.situation: the eod asks the driver about the drone's sensors.

Key.Original: Your drone's got a dedicated sensor - get close enough, and it'll detect any nearby explosives.
Key.Chinese: 你的無人機有專用傳感器——靠到足夠距離內，你就可以探測到周邊的爆炸物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的无人机有专用传感器——靠到足够距离内，你就可以探测到周边的爆炸物。

Key.Original: Question: how can I see if I've gotten all the mines?
Key.Chinese: 提問:我怎麼才能知道我排除了全部地雷?
Key.Chinesesimp: 提问:我怎么才能知道我排除了全部地雷?

Container.name: 007_eve_drone_safe_height
Container.situation: the player is warned about not dropping bombs too close to the ground. doing so will damage or destroy the drone.

Key.Original: Oh - and - very important.
Key.Chinese: 哦——還有——非常重要的一點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦——还有——非常重要的一点。

Key.Original: Do not drop any explosives if you're close to the ground.
Key.Chinese: 別在靠近地面的時候投放炸彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别在靠近地面的时候投放炸弹。

Key.Original: Just - don't wreck the tech. Thirty meters-plus, please.
Key.Chinese: 千萬...別把飛機搞壞。至少30米以上，拜託。
Key.Chinesesimp: 千万...别把飞机搞坏。至少30米以上，拜托。

Key.Original: Come on, Andy. What do you take me for?
Key.Chinese: 拜託，安迪。你把我當什麼人了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托，安迪。你把我当什么人了?

Container.name: 006_eve_drone_crosshair_and_ammo
Container.situation: the hud crosshair and ammo count is explained to the player.

Key.Original: Okay - now. The bombs. You only got four.
Key.Chinese: 好——現在說炸彈。你一共只有4枚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好——现在说炸弹。你一共只有4枚。

Key.Original: Release one and it'll drop straight down. Simple physics. If you run out, fly over to the van... there's plenty spare.
Key.Chinese: 釋放一枚，它就會直線下落。就靠重力。如果你打光了，飛回麵包車這邊...這裡多的是備用的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 释放一枚，它就会直线下落。就靠重力。如果你打光了，飞回面包车这边...这里多的是备用的。

Key.Original: Thanks.
Key.Chinese: 謝謝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢。

Container.name: 005_eve_minefield_enter
Container.situation: the drone approaches the southern minefield and its demining bombs are enabled.

Key.Original: Head's up. Enabling charges.
Key.Chinese: 注意。激活炸彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意。激活炸弹。

Container.name: 004_eve_drone_controlled
Container.situation: player takes control of the demining drone.

Key.Original: You got it?
Key.Chinese: 你懂了沒?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你懂了没?

Key.Original: So, you're gonna wanna use the auto-hover mode.
Key.Chinese: 你應該需要使用自動懸停模式。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你应该需要使用自动悬停模式。

Key.Original: Switch it on whenever you need to stay in one place.
Key.Chinese: 在你需要待在一處地方的時候就切換到這個模式。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在你需要待在一处地方的时候就切换到这个模式。

Key.Original: Looking good.
Key.Chinese: 看起來不錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看起来不错。

Key.Original: I'll arm the explosives once you've reached the minefield.
Key.Chinese: 我會在你抵達雷場的時候激活炸藥的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会在你抵达雷场的时候激活炸药的。

Key.Original: Auto-hover, right.
Key.Chinese: 自動懸停，好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自动悬停，好。

Container.name: 003_eve_terminal_equipped
Container.situation: player takes the drone terminal.

Key.Original: Cool. So, just, connect it to a drone and, yeah, take control.
Key.Chinese: 酷。所以就連接到無人機上，接管控制就好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 酷。所以就连接到无人机上，接管控制就好。

Key.Original: Alright. Got the terminal.
Key.Chinese: 好的，拿到終端機了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，拿到终端机了。

Container.name: 002_eve_barricade_cleared
Container.situation: the armored vehicle bulldozes the barricade.

Key.Original: Oh, by the way, while you were busy chatting to - well - whoever it is that isn't your wife...?
Key.Chinese: 哦，順帶一提，就在你忙著跟那個——好吧——不論是誰反正不是你老婆的女人忙著聊天的時候...
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，顺带一提，就在你忙着跟那个——好吧——不论是谁反正不是你老婆的女人忙着聊天的时候...

Key.Original: Yeah, yeah... well, anyway, I assembled the demining drones.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，好吧...嗯，不管怎麼，我組裝好了排雷無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，好吧...嗯，不管怎么，我组装好了排雷无人机。

Key.Original: Well, yeah. They're by the van.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，好啊。它們就在麵包車旁邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好啊。它们就在面包车旁边。

Key.Original: I told you, Andy, she's a journalist. Get to the point.
Key.Chinese: 我跟你說過了安迪，她是個記者。講正經的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我跟你说过了安迪，她是个记者。讲正经的。

Key.Original: Both of them?
Key.Chinese: 兩架都在?
Key.Chinesesimp: 两架都在?

Container.name: 001_hbi_post_leaflets
Container.situation: player returns from a memory to the town in the present.

Key.Original: Bet you wish we had one of those in Takistan, huh?
Key.Chinese: 我相信你希望在塔基斯坦也有這麼一架，嗯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我相信你希望在塔基斯坦也有这么一架，嗯?

Key.Original: I gotta admit... that's sixty tons of getting shit done.
Key.Chinese: 我得說...那次可真是倒了血霉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得说...那次可真是倒了血霉。

Container.name: 004_ex_danger_close
Container.situation: the player gets too close to the bulldozer as it clears explosives.

Key.Original: Hold up, Mac - you nuts? I wouldn't get too close to that thing...
Key.Chinese: 等等，麥克——你傻了嗎?我可不會靠那裡太近...
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，麦克——你傻了吗?我可不会靠那里太近...

Container.name: 003_eve_door_breached
Container.situation: the player approaches a breached door in the former aaf compound.

Key.Original: Morning. You been in?
Key.Chinese: 早安。你進來了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 早安。你进来了?

Key.Original: You kiddin' me? I ain't going in there, man. That shit's all yours.
Key.Chinese: 你搞笑嗎?我可那兒也不去。那全是你的工作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你搞笑吗?我可那儿也不去。那全是你的工作。

Container.name: 002_fil_road_cleared
Container.situation: an armored vehicle (called a 'bobcat') finishes clearing the road and parks in front of the barricade. player is informed that more houses are open for inspection.

Key.Original: Will do.
Key.Chinese: 明白。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。

Key.Original: Also, Mac? The NATO guys - they've kicked in all the doors.
Key.Chinese: 還有，麥克?那些北約的人——他們踢開了所有的門。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，麦克?那些北约的人——他们踢开了所有的门。

Key.Original: Okay, the road's safe now. Bring the van on up.
Key.Chinese: 好了，道路安全。把麵包車開上來吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了，道路安全。把面包车开上来吧。

Key.Original: You're free to search inside the buildings now.
Key.Chinese: 你現在可以搜索房屋內部了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你现在可以搜索房屋内部了。

Key.Original: Have fun reminiscing.
Key.Chinese: 追憶愉快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 追忆愉快。

Key.Original: Got it. At least I can get outta the fucking rain. I'll come find you in a bit.
Key.Chinese: 明白。至少我能躲躲這場該死的雨了。我一會兒再找你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。至少我能躲躲这场该死的雨了。我一会儿再找你。

Container.name: 001_hbi_post_airdrop
Container.situation: player returns from a memory back to reality.

Key.Original: Mac, head's up, Bobcat's on the move! Driver wouldn't wait.
Key.Chinese: 麥克，注意，"公貓"開始移動了!駕駛員不想再等了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦克，注意，"公猫"开始移动了!驾驶员不想再等了。

Key.Original: That's fine - thanks, Andy.
Key.Chinese: 好的——謝謝，安迪。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的——谢谢，安迪。

Key.Original: Hey, Kate? Bear with me.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，凱特?請忍一忍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，凯特?请忍一忍。

Key.Original: It's gonna get a little noisy here - we gotta clear out some mines.
Key.Chinese: 這邊可能會有點吵——我們正在清理一些地雷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这边可能会有点吵——我们正在清理一些地雷。

Key.Original: Take your time. Just let me know when you can talk.
Key.Chinese: 你自便。等你能說話了告訴我一聲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你自便。等你能说话了告诉我一声。

Container.name: 017_ex_step_bodybag
Container.situation: player steps on a bodybag!

Key.Original: Hey! Fuck head! You wanna watch where you're walking?
Key.Chinese: 嘿!蠢貨!你走路能不能長點眼睛?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿!蠢货!你走路能不能长点眼睛?!

Container.name: 016_loc_bobcat_soldiers
Container.situation: ambient chatter from a soldier, standing beside the bobcat.

Key.Original: Mediterranean sun, my ass. Oughta be drinking fuckin' Mai Tais in the Pacific.
Key.Chinese: 地中海的太陽，我的天啊。我更想去太平洋喝茅臺去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 地中海的太阳，我的天啊。我更想去太平洋喝茅台去。

Key.Original: I ain't losing a limb just so some latte-sipping fuckwit can feel good about 'emselves.
Key.Chinese: 我可不想因為某些坐辦公室的白癡自我感覺良好而丟掉一條胳膊一條腿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可不想因为某些坐办公室的白痴自我感觉良好而丢掉一条胳膊一条腿。

Container.name: 015_ex_road_pirate
Container.situation: dialogue played when player leaves the road for some reason. followed by ta asks tasks 2.

Key.Original: Hey, Mac, where you going?
Key.Chinese: 嘿，麥克，你去哪兒啊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，麦克，你去哪儿啊?

Key.Original: Aren't you gonna check the road...?
Key.Chinese: 你不看看路嗎...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不看看路吗...?

Container.name: 014_ex_entering_unequipped
Container.situation: an exception dialogue, played in case the player tries to go to work without taking any precautions.

Key.Original: Mac, come on, really? Aren't you forgetting something...?
Key.Chinese: 麥克，拜託，講道理?你是不是忘了點事啊...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦克，拜托，讲道理?你是不是忘了点事啊...?

Key.Original: Oh, real smart. But it's my ass your wife'll kick! You know I gotta bug y'about these things.
Key.Chinese: 哦，真聰明。可到時候你老婆是朝我發飆!你知道我可最受不了那些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，真聪明。可到时候你老婆是朝我发飙!你知道我可最受不了那些。

Key.Original: Now, come on back. Pick up the rest of your shit, genius.
Key.Chinese: 現在，回來。拿上你剩下的破玩意兒，天才。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，回来。拿上你剩下的破玩意儿，天才。

Key.Original: Oh, I'm sorry, Andy. Isn't it 'International Forget Your Shit' day?
Key.Chinese: 我真抱歉，安迪。今天是不是"國際忘了你的破玩意兒日"啊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我真抱歉，安迪。今天是不是"国际忘了你的破玩意儿日"啊?

Container.name: 013_ex_call_1
Container.situation: driver tells the eod to answer the phone.

Key.Original: Mac, are you ever gonna answer that thing?
Key.Chinese: 麥克，你打不打算接這個電話?
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦克，你打不打算接这个电话?

Container.name: 012_eve_memory_mechanic
Container.situation: the scene changes to the past again (but player now has control of their character).

Key.Original: You mean, before it was destroyed? Vividly.
Key.Chinese: 你是說，在小鎮被摧毀之前?記得很清楚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是说，在小镇被摧毁之前?记得很清楚。

Key.Original: How well do you remember the town?
Key.Chinese: 你還記得這座小鎮嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还记得这座小镇吗?

Container.name: 011_ta_asks_task_2
Container.situation: journalist asks what the purpose of being in the town is. a task is created afterwards. this occurs whether the road is cleared or not.

Key.Original: Um, y'know, poke around. Get rid of all the bad stuff. ERW. Explosive Remnants of War.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，你懂，在閒逛。排除這裡的壞東西。ERW。戰爭遺留爆炸物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，你懂，在闲逛。排除这里的坏东西。ERW。战争遗留爆炸物。

Key.Original: In Oreokastro, that'll be landmines and some left over ordnance.
Key.Chinese: 在奧雷奧卡斯特羅，這裡有地雷和遺留爆炸物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在奥雷奥卡斯特罗，这里有地雷和遗留爆炸物。

Key.Original: What do you hope to achieve in the town? What's your end goal?
Key.Chinese: 你在鎮裡打算幹什麼?你的結束目標是什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在镇里打算干什么?你的结束目标是什么?

Container.name: 010_eve_road_checked
Container.situation: player reaches the barricade and completes the task for checking the road. the task is now to search the town for all remaining explosives.

Key.Original: Cool, and the road?
Key.Chinese: 酷，那路上如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 酷，那路上如何?

Key.Original: Andy? I'm at the barricade.
Key.Chinese: 安迪，我現在在街壘上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 安迪，我现在在街垒上。

Key.Original: Yeah, it's what we thought... dozen or so APs... nothing the ol' Bobcat can't handle.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，跟我們想的差不多...十幾個反人員地雷...沒什麼老"公貓"處理不了的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，跟我们想的差不多...十几个反人员地雷...没什么老"公猫"处理不了的。

Container.name: 009_fil_task_filler_2
Container.situation: filler conversation.

Key.Original: Well, I'm sure my wife hopes so. But... I dunno. We do have a few new toys to help us out, though.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我確信我老婆也希望如此。但...我不知道。但我們還需要一些新玩具幫忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我确信我老婆也希望如此。但...我不知道。但我们还需要一些新玩具帮忙。

Key.Original: Mm. Demining drones can do my job in minutes. But then, they're not all that intelligent - or reliable - yet.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。排雷無人機可以在幾分鐘內幹完我的工作。但它們還沒有那麼智能...或者說可靠。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。排雷无人机可以在几分钟内干完我的工作。但它们还没有那么智能...或者说可靠。

Key.Original: Given all the advancements in technology, do you see a time where you won't need to... put yourself out there?
Key.Chinese: 在有這麼多科技進展的情況下，你覺不覺得可能有一天你不再需要...親力親為?
Key.Chinesesimp: 在有这么多科技进展的情况下，你觉不觉得可能有一天你不再需要...亲力亲为?

Key.Original: Toys? You mean, like, robotics?
Key.Chinese: 玩具?你是說，諸如機器人一類的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩具?你是说，诸如机器人一类的吗?

Container.name: 008_fil_task_filler
Container.situation: filler conversation, relating to demining before the player has found any 'memory objects'.

Key.Original: Yeah, but, not when I'm working. It hits you after - or before.
Key.Chinese: 會，但工作的時候不會。都是在之後——或者之前。
Key.Chinesesimp: 会，但工作的时候不会。都是在之后——或者之前。

Key.Original: Do you ever... get nervous?
Key.Chinese: 你會...緊張嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你会...紧张吗?

Container.name: 007_fil_altis_mines
Container.situation: filler conversation.

Key.Original: That we know of? Twenty-two. Twenty-three including whatever's here.
Key.Chinese: 我們知道的?22個。加上這邊23個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们知道的?22个。加上这边23个。

Key.Original: Plus, you've got Stratis. Another... four over there, I think?
Key.Chinese: 除此之外，在斯特拉蒂斯還有。大概...4個?記得如此。
Key.Chinesesimp: 除此之外，在斯特拉蒂斯还有。大概...4个?记得如此。

Key.Original: How many minefields are you facing on Altis?
Key.Chinese: 你在阿爾蒂斯島上有多少個雷場要處理?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在阿尔蒂斯岛上有多少个雷场要处理?

Key.Original: Pft... lotta variables... but, a clean-up operation of this size? If it's only IDAP? We're talking years.
Key.Chinese: 唔...這很難講...不過這個規模的清理行動?只讓國發援做?可能需要幾年吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 唔...这很难讲...不过这个规模的清理行动?只让国发援做?可能需要几年吧。

Key.Original: I see. And can you estimate - roughly - how long it would take to remove them all?
Key.Chinese: 我懂了。你能估計——粗略估計就好——你們需要多久才能把它們都清除乾淨嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我懂了。你能估计——粗略估计就好——你们需要多久才能把它们都清除干净吗?

Container.name: 006_fil_bobcat
Container.situation: dialogue that explains the reason why the player is checking for mines on the road and what will happen once the mines have been located.

Key.Original: Ordinarily? We'd disarm it. But today? Small oversight. We haven't got all of our gear right now.
Key.Chinese: 通常?我們拆掉它。不過今天呢?有點小疏忽。我們沒帶夠裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通常?我们拆掉它。不过今天呢?有点小疏忽。我们没带够装备。

Key.Original: Yeah - it's all good.
Key.Chinese: 嗯——沒什麼大問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯——没什么大问题。

Key.Original: Question: what happens when you do find a landmine?
Key.Chinese: 提問:如果你發現了一枚地雷應該怎麼辦?
Key.Chinesesimp: 提问:如果你发现了一枚地雷应该怎么办?

Key.Original: So long as there aren't any AT mines on the road, we can even deal with this mechanically.
Key.Chinese: 只要路面上沒有反坦克雷了，我們就可以哪怕以機械方式解決問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只要路面上没有反坦克雷了，我们就可以哪怕以机械方式解决问题。

Key.Original: Oh, it's on the way, I hope?
Key.Chinese: 哦，那我想那些東西可能已經在路上了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，那我想那些东西可能已经在路上了?

Key.Original: Mm. NATO has a Bobcat - an armored vehicle - which we can use.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。北約有一輛"公貓"——一種裝甲車輛。我們可以用它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。北约有一辆"公猫"——一种装甲车辆。我们可以用它。

Key.Original: It'll roll over the smaller mines - detonate them. Safer and easier than doing it by hand.
Key.Chinese: 它可以碾過小型地雷——壓發他們。這比用手更安全簡便。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它可以碾过小型地雷——压发他们。这比用手更安全简便。

Key.Original: Mechanically?
Key.Chinese: 機械方式?
Key.Chinesesimp: 机械方式?

Key.Original: Basically, picture a tank with a plow stuck on the end and, well, you won't be far off.
Key.Chinese: 基本上，想想一輛坦克在車頭裝了個推土鏟，嗯，就差不太遠了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 基本上，想想一辆坦克在车头装了个推土铲，嗯，就差不太远了。

Container.name: 005_fil_define_role
Container.situation: dialogue where the journalist questions the player on their current role with idap.

Key.Original: Yeah, I guess so. Now I'm almost entirely focused on EOD and UXO.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我猜的確如此。我現在基本只關注爆炸裝置和未爆兵器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我猜的确如此。我现在基本只关注爆炸装置和未爆兵器。

Key.Original: Yeah. That's the thing about mines: war or not - win, lose - they don't go away.
Key.Chinese: 對。這就是地雷的問題:不管有沒有戰爭，勝利還是失敗——它們都不會消失。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对。这就是地雷的问题:不管有没有战争，胜利还是失败——它们都不会消失。

Key.Original: So - since the war's now over - has your own role changed at all?
Key.Chinese: 因此——既然戰爭已經結束了——你的職責有沒有變化?
Key.Chinesesimp: 因此——既然战争已经结束了——你的职责有没有变化?

Key.Original: And that's something you did in the military, too?
Key.Chinese: 你在部隊裡也幹這個吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在部队里也干这个吧?

Container.name: 004_fil_asks_task
Container.situation: dialogue where the journalist asks the player what he's doing. designed to help the player with gameplay mechanics.

Key.Original: Sure. For now, I'm just sweeping the road for mines - getting a lay of the land, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 當然。現在，我只是在搜索道路上的地雷——搜索地表，懂吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然。现在，我只是在搜索道路上的地雷——搜索地表，懂吧?

Key.Original: The detector lets us see what we're dealing with here. I can work and chat.
Key.Chinese: 探測器可以讓我們看到我們要對付的目標。我能一邊說話一邊聊天。
Key.Chinesesimp: 探测器可以让我们看到我们要对付的目标。我能一边说话一边聊天。

Key.Original: Are you free to talk, Nathan?
Key.Chinese: 你現在能說話嗎，內森?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你现在能说话吗，内森?

Key.Original: Deadlines, huh?
Key.Chinese: 截稿期限什麼的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 截稿期限什么的?

Key.Original: I'll stop you if I need to concentrate or, y'know...
Key.Chinese: 我可以先停下，如果你需要集中精力或者什麼的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可以先停下，如果你需要集中精力或者什么的...

Key.Original: Oh, you're sure? That would be a great help.
Key.Chinese: 哦，你確定嗎?那能幫上大忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，你确定吗?那能帮上大忙。

Key.Original: Exactly.
Key.Chinese: 當然。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然。

Key.Original: Totally! No - of course - I'll stay on the line. You set the pace.
Key.Chinese: 當然!不，當然——我會繼續聽著。你按你的步調來就行。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然!不，当然——我会继续听着。你按你的步调来就行。

Container.name: 003_eve_minefield_entered
Container.situation: player reaches the barricade and completes the task for checking the road. the task is now to search the town for explosives. the driver mentions the missing mine toolkit, which he forgot to pack.

Key.Original: Hey - sorry - I forgot to mention: the demining toolkit? Totally forgot to pack it up this morning.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，抱歉，我忘了提了:排雷工具包?我早上完全忘了打包了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，抱歉，我忘了提了:排雷工具包?我早上完全忘了打包了。

Key.Original: Apologies again. It's en route. I'll let you know when it arrives from dispatch.
Key.Chinese: 當真抱歉。它已經在路上了。等它到了我會讓你知道的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当真抱歉。它已经在路上了。等它到了我会让你知道的。

Key.Original: No big deal - we're just locating the mines for now - just keep me posted.
Key.Chinese: 沒什麼大問題——我們現在也只是在定位地雷——就隨時通知我就好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没什么大问题——我们现在也只是在定位地雷——就随时通知我就好。

Container.name: 002_eve_equipped
Container.situation: the player equips himself and the driver reminds them that he has a mine detector.

Key.Original: Alright then, you got everything? Detector working? You, uh, remember how to switch it on, right?
Key.Chinese: 那好，你都拿好了?探測器工作正常?你，呃，你記得把它打開了，對吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那好，你都拿好了?探测器工作正常?你，呃，你记得把它打开了，对吧?

Key.Original: Then... you're all set.
Key.Chinese: 那...你已經可以上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那...你已经可以上了。

Key.Original: Yeah, take it slow, Mac. We'll let the Bobcat do the heavy lifting later.
Key.Chinese: 好，慢慢來，麥克。我們會讓"公貓"一會兒負責重活。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，慢慢来，麦克。我们会让"公猫"一会儿负责重活。

Key.Original: Yeah. I got it, Andy.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。我都搞定了，安迪。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。我都搞定了，安迪。

Key.Original: Thanks. So, for now, I'll just make a note of where the mines are.
Key.Chinese: 謝謝。現在我只是記下地雷的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢。现在我只是记下地雷的位置。

Container.name: 001_to_intro_post_van
Container.situation: dialogue played when the player first moves the character.

Key.Original: Alright, Mac. That's your stuff all laid out here.
Key.Chinese: 好的，麥克。你的東西就全在這兒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，麦克。你的东西就全在这儿了。

Key.Original: Hold on just a sec, Kate. I need to get set up.
Key.Chinese: 等一下，凱特。我需要準備裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等一下，凯特。我需要准备装备。

Key.Original: Take your time.
Key.Chinese: 您自便。
Key.Chinesesimp: 您自便。

Key.Original: Leave Building
Key.Chinese: 離開建築物
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开建筑物

Key.Original: It's not safe there.
Key.Chinese: 這裡不安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里不安全。

Key.Original: Fight Attackers
Key.Chinese: 和進攻者戰鬥
Key.Chinesesimp: 和进攻者战斗

Key.Original: You have a weapon! Take a stand with other guerrillas against the AAF soldiers!
Key.Chinese: 你有了武器!和其他游擊隊員一起戰鬥，對抗阿爾蒂斯武裝力量士兵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有了武器!和其他游击队员一起战斗，对抗AAF士兵!

Key.Original: Get to Church
Key.Chinese: 前往教堂
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往教堂

Key.Original: Get to the IDAP doctor as soon as possible and hope the combatants will notice you're unarmed.
Key.Chinese: 盡快找到國發援大夫，希望戰鬥人員們注意到你沒有武裝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽快找到国发援大夫，希望战斗人员们注意到你没有武装。

Key.Original: ****TO TRANSLATE****

Container.name: 030_ex_fia_killed
Container.situation: player shoots a friendly unit.

Key.Original: Y'know, there's something that really sticks in my mind about that day: the fog.
Key.Chinese: 你知道，關於那天有件事一直在我的頭腦中揮之不去:濃霧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道，关于那天有件事一直在我的头脑中挥之不去:浓雾。

Key.Original: How anyone could tell who was who? I dunno.
Key.Chinese: 誰能分得清誰是誰?我不知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁能分得清谁是谁?我不知道。

Container.name: 029_ex_acctime
Container.situation: player attempts to accelerate time. there is a special keyboard key that can do this.

Key.Original: Time moves in one direction. Memory, another...
Key.Chinese: 時間在朝一個方向流動。記憶則朝另一個防線...
Key.Chinesesimp: 时间在朝一个方向流动。记忆则朝另一个防线...

Container.name: 028_cc_outro_unarmed
Container.situation: closing cutscene after fleeing to the church unarmed.

Key.Original: An hour or two later, the government sent a truck to our camp.
Key.Chinese: 一個或兩個小時之後，政府派了一輛卡車到我們的營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个或两个小时之后，政府派了一辆卡车到我们的营地。

Key.Original: The soldiers searched the civilians for hidden weapons.
Key.Chinese: 士兵搜查了平民，尋找隱藏武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 士兵搜查了平民，寻找隐藏武器。

Key.Original: No - and, we'd already checked. It's vital our camps are weapon-free spaces - safe havens.
Key.Chinese: 沒找到——我們都已經查過了。讓我們的營地沒有武器非常重要——安全天堂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没找到——我们都已经查过了。让我们的营地没有武器非常重要——安全天堂。

Key.Original: Yeah, just about. We talked a few times after. I dunno, he seemed different.
Key.Chinese: 是，就是這樣。我們後來又談過幾次。我不知道，但他看起來變了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，就是这样。我们后来又谈过几次。我不知道，但他看起来变了。

Key.Original: But they didn't find any?
Key.Chinese: 但是他們什麼都沒找到?
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是他们什么都没找到?

Key.Original: It's hard to tell. But, like I said: he kept looking for his brother.
Key.Chinese: 很難講。但是，就像我說的那樣:他一直在找他的兄弟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很难讲。但是，就像我说的那样:他一直在找他的兄弟。

Key.Original: Mm. And - Markos - he must have made it through, then?
Key.Chinese: 嗯。還有——馬爾科斯——他一定活下來了，然後呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。还有——马尔科斯——他一定活下来了，然后呢?

Key.Original: Yeah. To think, he'd survived all that... just to return to the same spot, less than a year later...
Key.Chinese: 嗯。想起來，他活過了那一切...結果只是在不到一年之後回到同樣的地方...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。想起来，他活过了那一切...结果只是在不到一年之后回到同样的地方...

Key.Original: I can imagine why. And what did he do after?
Key.Chinese: 我能想像為什麼。他之後做了什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我能想象为什么。他之后做了什么?

Key.Original: Of course. And... Markos... his body? It's still there - in the churchyard?
Key.Chinese: 當然。而馬爾科斯...他的屍體?是還在——還在教堂小院裡嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然。而马尔科斯...他的尸体?是还在——还在教堂小院里吗?

Container.name: 027_cc_outro_armed
Container.situation: closing cutscene after clearing the town of all the enemies.

Key.Original: Not that day. But it did eventually, when the last of the guerrillas left.
Key.Chinese: 那天沒有。但是最終還是陷落了。在最後的游擊隊員離開之後。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那天没有。但是最终还是陷落了。在最后的游击队员离开之后。

Key.Original: Not a clue. Never got a straight answer from the guy. He did one or two last jobs for IDAP and then... nothing.
Key.Chinese: 不清楚。他從來沒正面回答過。他之後為國發援又做了一兩件事，然後...沒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不清楚。他从来没正面回答过。他之后为国发援又做了一两件事，然后...没了。

Key.Original: The town, it didn't fall to government forces?
Key.Chinese: 那座村鎮，它沒有陷落到政府軍手中嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那座村镇，它没有陷落到政府军手中吗?

Key.Original: Yeah. Though, sometimes, he gave more away by what he didn't say, if that makes any sense.
Key.Chinese: 是啊。不過有時候，他不說透露出的東西更多，如果合理的話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。不过有时候，他不说透露出的东西更多，如果合理的话。

Key.Original: And Markos, he went with them?
Key.Chinese: 而馬爾科斯，他跟他們一起走了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 而马尔科斯，他跟他们一起走了吗?

Key.Original: Right, yeah. There's the scars we see, and... those we don't.
Key.Chinese: 對。一些傷疤我們能看到，而另一些...我們看不到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对。一些伤疤我们能看到，而另一些...我们看不到。

Key.Original: Strange... and you heard these events from him firsthand?
Key.Chinese: 奇怪...你聽說的這些事是他親口告訴你的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 奇怪...你听说的这些事是他亲口告诉你的吗?

Key.Original: Sure. And I suppose, getting through something like that... it must have left an... indelible mark?
Key.Chinese: 的確。我懷疑，經歷這樣的事情後...會給他帶來某種...難以磨滅的印記吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 的确。我怀疑，经历这样的事情后...会给他带来某种...难以磨灭的印记吧。

Container.name: 026_eve_fia_killed_armed
Container.situation: all the defenders were killed by government forces. the player is armed.

Key.Original: Pretty bad. Both sides, they must've lost at least a dozen men.
Key.Chinese: 很糟糕。兩邊都是，他們可能至少損失了十幾人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很糟糕。两边都是，他们可能至少损失了十几人。

Key.Original: The defenders were completely wiped out. Markos was the lone survivor.
Key.Chinese: 防禦者被全殲了。馬爾科斯是唯一的倖存者。
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御者被全歼了。马尔科斯是唯一的幸存者。

Key.Original: How bad were the casualties in that engagement?
Key.Chinese: 交戰中的傷亡情況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 交战中的伤亡情况如何?

Container.name: 025_eve_fia_killed_unarmed
Container.situation: all the defenders were killed by government forces. the player is unarmed.

Key.Original: The defenders were completely wiped out - both sides, they must've lost at least a dozen men.
Key.Chinese: 防禦者被全殲了——雙方都算上，可能一共損失了十幾人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御者被全歼了——双方都算上，可能一共损失了十几人。

Key.Original: How bad were the casualties in that engagement?
Key.Chinese: 交戰中的傷亡情況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 交战中的伤亡情况如何?

Container.name: 024_loc_idap_worker
Container.situation: player approaches the body of the idap worker, killed in the previous scenario.

Key.Original: Remember our doctor, the one killed in the airstrike?
Key.Chinese: 還記得我們的大夫，在空襲中死去的那個嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 还记得我们的大夫，在空袭中死去的那个吗?

Key.Original: It was actually Markos who discovered him.
Key.Chinese: 事實上是馬爾科斯發現了他的遺體。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实上是马尔科斯发现了他的遗体。

Key.Original: I do, yes.
Key.Chinese: 是，還記得。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，还记得。

Container.name: 023_loc_tree
Container.situation: player approaches the collapsed tree.

Key.Original: Not sure I ever told you about the old oak tree here. It was destroyed by the airstrike.
Key.Chinese: 我不確定我跟你講沒講過這棵老橡樹。它在空襲中被摧毀了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不确定我跟你讲没讲过这棵老橡树。它在空袭中被摧毁了。

Container.name: 022_loc_barricade
Container.situation: player approaches the barricade, the once constructed by alexis.

Key.Original: That barricade Alexis made? Y'know, the army never did get past it.
Key.Chinese: 就是阿雷克西斯構築的街壘?你知道，軍隊最終也沒能突破它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就是阿雷克西斯构筑的街垒?你知道，军队最终也没能突破它。

Container.name: 021_eve_first_blood
Container.situation: player kills an enemy combatant.

Key.Original: There was no going back once he had blood on his hands.
Key.Chinese: 一旦手上沾了血就沒有回頭路了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦手上沾了血就没有回头路了。

Container.name: 020_eve_near_fia
Container.situation: player stands near a combatant, making himself a potential target.

Key.Original: Getting caught in the crossfire was a danger.
Key.Chinese: 在交叉火力中是非常危險的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在交叉火力中是非常危险的。

Key.Original: He soon realized he had to keep his distance.
Key.Chinese: 他很快意識到他需要保持距離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他很快意识到他需要保持距离。

Container.name: 019_ta_weapon_dropped
Container.situation: player drops the weapon they took. they are a civilian, and no longer a target.

Key.Original: He knew that picking up a gun would make him a target.
Key.Chinese: 他知道撿起武器會讓他成為目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他知道捡起武器会让他成为目标。

Key.Original: Markos decided to throw down his weapon, and move towards the church.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯決定扔掉武器，繼續向教堂前進。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯决定扔掉武器，继续向教堂前进。

Container.name: 018_eve_unarmed_loaded
Container.situation: player loaded mission several times while attempting to play it unarmed.

Key.Original: Markos was no military man, but he knew which way to point a gun...
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯不是軍人，但他知道該怎麼用槍...
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯不是军人，但他知道该怎么用枪...

Container.name: 017_ta_unarmed_5
Container.situation: player leaves the building without taking a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: He could've picked up a weapon, but he didn't.
Key.Chinese: 他本可以撿起武器，但他沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他本可以捡起武器，但他没有。

Key.Original: Making it to the church seemed like his only option.
Key.Chinese: 去教堂成了他唯一的選項。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去教堂成了他唯一的选项。

Container.name: 016_ta_unarmed_4
Container.situation: player leaves the building without taking a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: Markos was a civilian, a mechanic. He had to get to the church.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯是平民，機修工。他需要去教堂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯是平民，机修工。他需要去教堂。

Container.name: 015_ta_unarmed_3
Container.situation: player leaves the building without taking a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: Markos left the ruins of his brother's home without a weapon. Stumbled his way towards the church.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯沒有拿武器就離開了他兄弟家。掙扎著向教堂前行。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯没有拿武器就离开了他兄弟家。挣扎着向教堂前行。

Container.name: 014_ta_unarmed_2
Container.situation: player leaves the building without taking a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: Injured, unarmed, alone - he set off towards the church.
Key.Chinese: 受了傷，沒有武器，孤身一人——他向教堂進發了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 受了伤，没有武器，孤身一人——他向教堂进发了。

Container.name: 013_ta_unarmed_1
Container.situation: player leaves the building without taking a weapon.

Key.Original: Markos was there to talk his brother down, I think.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯去那兒是為了讓他兄弟放棄的，我猜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯去那儿是为了让他兄弟放弃的，我猜。

Key.Original: He was only interested in survival - and that meant getting to IDAP - at the church.
Key.Chinese: 他只對活下去感興趣——這就意味著要去找國發援——去教堂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他只对活下去感兴趣——这就意味着要去找国发援——去教堂。

Key.Original: Protected by the Geneva Conventions. Article, uh, Fifty-One.
Key.Chinese: 被《日內瓦公約》第，呃，第51條保護。
Key.Chinesesimp: 被《日内瓦公约》第，呃，第51条保护。

Key.Original: But, you gotta remember: right after the strike? It was total chaos.
Key.Chinese: 但你得記住:在空襲之後?完全是一團混亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但你得记住:在空袭之后?完全是一团混乱。

Key.Original: He remained a non-combatant, then?
Key.Chinese: 他在這之後一直是非戰鬥人員咯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他在这之后一直是非战斗人员咯?

Container.name: 012_ta_armed_loaded
Container.situation: player loaded mission several times while attempting to play it armed.

Key.Original: Of course, having a weapon, using it? That would revoke his protective status as a non-combatant. Not doing so may've been safer...
Key.Chinese: 當然，擁有武器，並使用?這會讓他失去作為非戰鬥人員的被保護權。不這樣做可能會更安全些...
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，拥有武器，并使用?这会让他失去作为非战斗人员的被保护权。不这样做可能会更安全些...

Container.name: 011_ta_armed_5
Container.situation: player leaves the building with a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: Markos must have known that being armed made him a target... but enough was enough.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯知道武裝起來會讓他成為目標...但他還是這麼做了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯知道武装起来会让他成为目标...但他还是这么做了。

Container.name: 010_ta_armed_4
Container.situation: player leaves the building with a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: Despite the odds, he was determined to make a stand.
Key.Chinese: 即便面臨萬難，他仍決定要做抵抗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 即便面临万难，他仍决定要做抵抗。

Container.name: 009_ta_armed_3
Container.situation: player leaves the building with a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: Markos picked up a gun. He had to choose a side.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯撿起了武器。他決定選擇一邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯捡起了武器。他决定选择一边。

Container.name: 008_ta_armed_2
Container.situation: player leaves the building with a weapon. variant text.

Key.Original: He'd found a weapon. Enough was enough.
Key.Chinese: 他找到了武器。這就夠了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他找到了武器。这就够了。

Container.name: 007_ta_armed_1
Container.situation: player leaves the building with a weapon.

Key.Original: I reckon Markos was there to join the fight.
Key.Chinese: 我記得馬爾科斯在那裡加入了戰鬥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我记得马尔科斯在那里加入了战斗。

Key.Original: He wasted no time in grabbing a rifle, that's for sure.
Key.Chinese: 他沒費功夫就抓起了一把槍，這是真的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他没费功夫就抓起了一把枪，这是真的。

Container.name: 006_to_intro
Container.situation: player takes control of the character.

Key.Original: Markos had been wounded - caught in the leg by shrapnel.
Key.Chinese: 馬爾科斯受了傷——腿上中了彈片。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马尔科斯受了伤——腿上中了弹片。

Key.Original: I see... do you think he went there to talk his brother into leaving, or, to join the cause?
Key.Chinese: 我懂了...你覺得他來是想讓他兄弟離開，還是想加入他的事業?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我懂了...你觉得他来是想让他兄弟离开，还是想加入他的事业?

Container.name: 005_oc_intro
Container.situation: opening cinematic.

Key.Original: Mm... but Oreokastro? It wasn't just a town. It had become a symbol of the resistance.
Key.Chinese: 嗯...但奧雷奧卡斯特羅?那可不僅是一座村鎮。那是抵抗運動的象徵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯...但奥雷奥卡斯特罗?那可不仅是一座村镇。那是抵抗运动的象征。

Key.Original: It was important for both sides - and government forces were making their final push.
Key.Chinese: 它對雙方都很重要——政府軍實施了總攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它对双方都很重要——政府军实施了总攻。

Key.Original: There were still guerrillas in the town - even after the strike?
Key.Chinese: 等於當時還有游擊隊員在鎮裡——哪怕在空襲之後?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等于当时还有游击队员在镇里——哪怕在空袭之后?

Key.Original: Alexis had made it out. But his brother? Like I say: Markos was always shit outta luck.
Key.Chinese: 阿雷克西斯成功逃脫。但他的兄弟呢?就像我說的:馬爾科斯總是運氣很背。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿雷克西斯成功逃脱。但他的兄弟呢?就像我说的:马尔科斯总是运气很背。

Key.Original: The guy had been waiting at his brother's place.
Key.Chinese: 那傢伙就在他兄弟的家裡等著。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那家伙就在他兄弟的家里等着。

Container.name: 004_rbi_intro
Container.situation: intro conversation, occurring during black-in and timeline visualisation.

Key.Original: Poor guy. Always seemed to be in the wrong place at the wrong time...
Key.Chinese: 倒霉鬼...總是在錯誤的時間出現在錯誤的地點...
Key.Chinesesimp: 倒霉鬼...总是在错误的时间出现在错误的地点...

Key.Original: He'd made it through the airstrike, but, only to get caught up in the assault that followed right after...
Key.Chinese: 他的確活過了空襲，但，又被捲進了之後的突擊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他的确活过了空袭，但，又被卷进了之后的突击...

Key.Original: Hm. Tell me more about Markos.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。跟我講講馬爾科斯吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。跟我讲讲马尔科斯吧。

Container.name: 003_hbo_hub_intro
Container.situation: player has activated the 'memory object'.

Key.Original: Yeah. Although, honestly, it was a small miracle he'd made it that far...
Key.Chinese: 對。當然，實話說，他能活這麼久就是個小奇跡了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 对。当然，实话说，他能活这么久就是个小奇迹了...

Key.Original: The civilian killed at the church - the landmine, right?
Key.Chinese: 那個死在教堂——被地雷炸死的平民，對吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个死在教堂——被地雷炸死的平民，对吧?

Container.name: 002_trg_hub_intro
Container.situation: player activates the 'memory object' and triggers the mission.

Key.Original: There's an old photograph here - picture of Alexis and his brother, Markos.
Key.Chinese: 這兒有張舊照片——阿雷克西斯和他的兄弟馬爾科斯的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这儿有张旧照片——阿雷克西斯和他的兄弟马尔科斯的。

Container.name: 001_ex_blocked
Container.situation: the mission trigger is not yet accessible to the player. he should come back later. last line will be repeated in variant texts.

Key.Original: Shit. You'll need the toolkit for that job. I'll get on the horn to dispatch - see what's taking 'em so long.
Key.Chinese: 該死。你需要工具包才能做這個。我正打算問問——看看他們為什麼要花這麼久。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。你需要工具包才能做这个。我正打算问问——看看他们为什么要花这么久。

Key.Original: Mm. Gotta UXO here - dug right into the wall.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，這兒有未爆兵器——正好鑽進牆裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，这儿有未爆兵器——正好钻进墙里。

Key.Original: I'll come back later.
Key.Chinese: 我一會兒回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我一会儿回来。

Key.Original: Identify All Targets
Key.Chinese: 辨識所有目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 辨识所有目标

Key.Original:
Guerrillas have turned Oreokastro into a stronghold. Identify all potential targets to know where to call the air strike.

We also have reports about a potential humanitarian presence in the town; locate them before calling the strike.
Key.Chinese:
游擊隊把奧雷奧卡斯特羅改造成了要塞。辨識所有潛在目標以瞭解該在哪兒呼叫空襲。

我們還得到報告說有可能有人道主義組織存在在鎮內;在呼叫空襲前確認他們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp:
游击队把奥雷奥卡斯特罗改造成了要塞。辨识所有潜在目标以了解该在哪儿呼叫空袭。

我们还得到报告说有可能有人道主义组织存在在镇内;在呼叫空袭前确认他们的位置。

Key.Original: Reach Observation Post
Key.Chinese: 抵達觀察所
Key.Chinesesimp: 抵达观察所

Key.Original: Move to the castle walls overlooking the town.
Key.Chinese: 前往能俯視村鎮的城堡圍牆處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往能俯视村镇的城堡围墙处。

Key.Original: Move to EXFIL
Key.Chinese: 前往撤離點
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往撤离点

Key.Original: Rendezvous with the secondary team which will pick you up for extraction.
Key.Chinese: 和第2小組回合，他們會把你們接走撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 和第2小组回合，他们会把你们接走撤离。

Key.Original: Direct Air Strike
Key.Chinese: 引導空襲
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导空袭

Key.Original: Neutralize Technicals
Key.Chinese: 消滅武裝越野車
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭武装越野车

Key.Original: Neutralize Sniper
Key.Chinese: 消滅狙擊手
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭狙击手

Key.Original: (Don't Kill IDAP Worker!)
Key.Chinese: (別殺害國發援工作者!)
Key.Chinesesimp: (别杀害国发援工作者!)

Key.Original: It seems an IDAP doctor is operating in the town at this moment. Is he an acceptable casualty? You may wait to see if he returns back to the IDAP camp.
Key.Chinese: 看起來此時一名國發援大夫正在鎮內活動。他是可接受的傷亡嗎?你可以等他回到國發援營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看起来此时一名国发援大夫正在镇内活动。他是可接受的伤亡吗?你可以等他回到国发援营地。

Key.Original: Don't Destroy IDAP Camp!
Key.Chinese: 別摧毀國發援營地!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别摧毁国发援营地!

Key.Original: Neutralize Heavy Gunner
Key.Chinese: 殲滅重機槍手
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭重机枪手

Key.Original: Neutralize HQ
Key.Chinese: 殲滅指揮所
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭指挥所

Key.Original: An AAF bomber will arrive from the east and drop a single cluster bomb at the designated position. It has a significant spread, so make sure to point at a location which will cover the most targets.
Key.Chinese: 一架阿爾蒂斯武裝力量轟炸機將從東側抵達並向指定位置投下一枚集束炸彈。它的覆蓋範圍很大，所以注意指示的位置能覆蓋大部分目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架AAF轰炸机将从东侧抵达并向指定位置投下一枚集束炸弹。它的覆盖范围很大，所以注意指示的位置能覆盖大部分目标。

Key.Original: Call an air strike on the town
Key.Chinese: 呼叫空襲打擊村鎮
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫空袭打击村镇

Key.Original: Neutralize Barricade
Key.Chinese: 消滅街壘
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭街垒

Key.Original: Clear Castle
Key.Chinese: 清理城堡
Key.Chinesesimp: 清理城堡

Key.Original: Guerrillas are using the castle as an observation post and artillery base. Move in and neutralize all enemies.
Key.Chinese: 游擊隊用城堡作為觀察所和炮兵營地。前進並消滅所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队用城堡作为观察所和炮兵营地。前进并消灭所有敌人。

Key.Original: (Remain Unseen)
Key.Chinese: (保持不被發現)
Key.Chinesesimp: (保持不被发现)

Key.Original: If an enemy spots you, neutralize him before he can warn the others.
Key.Chinese: 如果敵人發現了你，在他能警告同夥前消滅他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果敌人发现了你，在他能警告同伙前消灭他。

Container.name: 039_cc_outro_2
Container.situation: there's a distant whirring sound as the drone carrying the toolkit approaches.

Key.Original: No, I'm, uh, I'm still here. I just need to go grab something real quick - this'll only take a sec.
Key.Chinese: 不，我，嗯，我還在——我需要稍微離開會兒拿點東西——很快就完事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，我，嗯，我还在——我需要稍微离开会儿拿点东西——很快就完事。

Key.Original: Nathan?
Key.Chinese: 內森?
Key.Chinesesimp: 内森?

Container.name: 038_cc_outro
Container.situation: closing cutscene.

Key.Original: I can certainly say the devastation was severe. Dozens killed - combatants and non-combatants alike.
Key.Chinese: 我可以確定損害非常嚴重。十幾人死亡，戰鬥人員和非戰鬥人員都有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可以确定损害非常严重。十几人死亡，战斗人员和非战斗人员都有。

Key.Original: The guerrillas? They were in total disarray. Many fled - retreating to the mountains.
Key.Chinese: 游擊隊?他們完全亂了套。很多人跑了——撤往山中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队?他们完全乱了套。很多人跑了——撤往山中。

Key.Original: And IDAP, we did what we could. But... there were so many wounded. So many we'd never be able to identify.
Key.Chinese: 至於國發援，我們盡了力。但是...受傷的人太多了。很多人始終無法辨識。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于国发援，我们尽了力。但是...受伤的人太多了。很多人始终无法辨识。

Container.name: 037_fil_moving_to_exfil
Container.situation: player moves to an exfiltration point. the scene flickers between two realities, or conflicting versions of the story.

Key.Original: Yeah. Who knows? Maybe with good reason.
Key.Chinese: 是啊。誰知道呢?也許有什麼好理由吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。谁知道呢?也许有什么好理由吧。

Key.Original: Look, I dunno... there were shell casings - found at the castle. NATO mil-spec.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我不知道...一些彈殼——在城堡裡發現的。北約軍用型號。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我不知道...一些弹壳——在城堡里发现的。北约军用型号。

Key.Original: I understand that CSAT denied any involvement.
Key.Chinese: 我理解廣協同盟不承認任何介入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我理解广协不承认任何介入。

Key.Original: Or, they were there. Maybe... trying to win back the government's support. Maybe...
Key.Chinese: 或者他們的確在。或許...試圖贏回政府的支持;或許...
Key.Chinesesimp: 或者他们的确在。或许...试图赢回政府的支持;或许...

Key.Original: Oh?
Key.Chinese: 哦?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦?

Key.Original: I dunno.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。

Key.Original: Okay. So then, either they were supplying the guerrillas or...
Key.Chinese: 好吧。那也就是說，要麼他們就是為游擊隊提供補給，要麼...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。那也就是说，要么他们就是为游击队提供补给，要么...

Key.Original: What?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么?

Container.name: 036_eve_ngo_worker_dead
Container.situation: after the airstrike, when player called it without even bothering to locate the idap worker. worst possible outcome for the mission.

Key.Original: No. He, um, he lost his life. Killed trying to save others.
Key.Chinese: 不，他，他死了。在試圖救人的時候。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，他，他死了。在试图救人的时候。

Container.name: 035_eve_ngo_worker_dead_spotted
Container.situation: after the airstrike, when the idap worked was revealed, but player called the strike before he could move to safety.

Key.Original: I'm afraid not. He was close. A minute later... he'd probably have made it.
Key.Chinese: 恐怕不是。他離得太近了。要再晚一分鐘...可能他就能活下來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恐怕不是。他离得太近了。要再晚一分钟...可能他就能活下来。

Container.name: 034_eve_ngo_worker_alive
Container.situation: after the airstrike, when it was called only after the idap worked moved to safety. the player, however, had no idea about it.

Key.Original: He did. Sheer dumb luck. That airstrike was coming - whether he was in the town or not.
Key.Chinese: 他活下來了。狗屎運。空襲來了——才不管他在不在鎮裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他活下来了。狗屎运。空袭来了——才不管他在不在镇里。

Container.name: 033_eve_ngo_worker_alive_spotted
Container.situation: response given after the airstrike, when the idap worker was located and the player waited until he moved to safety. best possible outcome for the player.

Key.Original: He did. It's even possible they delayed the airstrike. Else, it was... one amazing coincidence.
Key.Chinese: 他活下來了。甚至可能是它們刻意推遲了空襲。或者可能是是...某種驚人的巧合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他活下来了。甚至可能是它们刻意推迟了空袭。或者可能是是...某种惊人的巧合。

Container.name: 032_eve_ngo_worker_status
Container.situation: opening dialogue given by the journalist, which is used more than once. it precedes several dialogue variations, where the eod's response is different.

Key.Original: Let's talk about IDAP's doctor. You said he was on his way to the church.
Key.Chinese: 我們來談談國發援的大夫吧。你說他正在去教堂的路上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们来谈谈国发援的大夫吧。你说他正在去教堂的路上。

Key.Original: Did he make it there?
Key.Chinese: 他活下來了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他活下来了吗?

Container.name: 031_ta_air_strike_completed
Container.situation: airstrike is completed, all targets neutralized.

Key.Original: By all accounts, the town just... seemed to explode. Buildings were burning for days.
Key.Chinese: 根據所有人的說法，村鎮就像...整個炸飛了。建築物燒了好幾天。
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据所有人的说法，村镇就像...整个炸飞了。建筑物烧了好几天。

Key.Original: Yeah. Last seen leaving the castle. Heading west.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。最後被目擊到離開城堡。向西走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。最后被目击到离开城堡。向西走了。

Key.Original: And - this spotter - he just... disappeared?
Key.Chinese: 那——這名觀察員，他就...消失了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那——这名观察员，他就...消失了吗?

Container.name: 030_ex_air_strike_failed
Container.situation: airstrike is completed, some targets remain. the mission fails.

Key.Original: If they'd missed their targets? That would've been a catastrophe. That simply could not happen...
Key.Chinese: 要是他們錯失了目標?那將會是災難。那根本不可能發生...
Key.Chinesesimp: 要是他们错失了目标?那将会是灾难。那根本不可能发生...

Container.name: 029_ex_ngo_neutralized
Container.situation: airstrike hits the ngo camp at the church! the mission fails.

Key.Original: If our camp had been hit, though - I mean, can you imagine the casualties?
Key.Chinese: 如果我們的營地也被擊中——我是說，你能想像傷亡嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我们的营地也被击中——我是说，你能想象伤亡吗?

Container.name: 028_fil_air_strike_called
Container.situation: player calls the airstrike. gameplay instructions.

Key.Original: Sure, I mean, with a designator, you just... switch it on, aim it at, well, whatever.
Key.Chinese: 當然，我是說，你有指示器。只要...打開它，瞄準，就行了
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，我是说，你有指示器。只要...打开它，瞄准，就行了

Key.Original: The idea is that you remain in place - y'know, keep the laser on-target.
Key.Chinese: 方法就是一直不動——讓你的激光一直指向目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 方法就是一直不动——让你的激光一直指向目标。

Key.Original: Do you know why the government signed-off on such a... heavy-handed response?
Key.Chinese: 你知道為什麼政府會批準下...這麼重的手嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道为什么政府会批准下...这么重的手吗?

Key.Original: A cluster bomb - that's... rather indiscriminate. Even if it was laser-guided.
Key.Chinese: 集束炸彈——那是...完全無差別的攻擊。即便在有激光制導的情況下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 集束炸弹——那是...完全无差别的攻击。即便在有激光制导的情况下。

Key.Original: But, even if it's done perfectly? Lotta... uncontrolled variables.
Key.Chinese: 但是，哪怕能漂亮地完成?也會有...很多不可控變量。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是，哪怕能漂亮地完成?也会有...很多不可控变量。

Container.name: 027_eve_ngo_worker_move
Container.situation: idap worker starts moving towards the church, but the player has not spotted him yet.

Key.Original: One of our doctors was out with medical supplies, despite the fighting.
Key.Chinese: 我們的一名大夫當時帶著醫療補給在外面，沒參加戰鬥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的一名大夫当时带着医疗补给在外面，没参加战斗。

Key.Original: No - out in the open - but he was heading back there...
Key.Chinese: 不，是在空地上。但他正在往回走...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，是在空地上。但他正在往回走...

Key.Original: He wasn't at the church?
Key.Chinese: 他不在教堂裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他不在教堂里?

Container.name: 026_ngo_worker_move_spotted
Container.situation: idap worker starts moving towards the church, where he will be safe.

Key.Original: He was... heading back there.
Key.Chinese: 他當時...正在回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他当时...正在回来。

Key.Original: This doctor... did he return to the church in time or...?
Key.Chinese: 那大夫他...成功回了教堂還是...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那大夫他...成功回了教堂还是...?

Container.name: 025_eve_ngo_worker_spotted_late
Container.situation: player identifies idap worker in the town after the strike has been called. also plays after air strike called if player has not yet revealed the idap worker.

Key.Original: One of our doctors was out on the front line with medical supplies.
Key.Chinese: 我們的一名大夫當時正帶著醫療補給在前線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的一名大夫当时正带着医疗补给在前线。

Key.Original: No - he was out in the open...
Key.Chinese: 不，他在外面...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，他在外面...

Key.Original: Wait, he wasn't at the church?
Key.Chinese: 等等，他不在教堂?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等，他不在教堂?

Container.name: 024_eve_ngo_worker_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies an idap worker in the town.

Key.Original: Mm. One of our doctors.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。我們的一個大夫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。我们的一个大夫。

Key.Original: He'd gone out with medical supplies, despite the fighting.
Key.Chinese: 我們的一名大夫當時帶著醫療補給在外面，沒參加戰鬥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的一名大夫当时带着医疗补给在外面，没参加战斗。

Key.Original: Did IDAP have any workers operating outside the camp?
Key.Chinese: 國發援當時有工作人員在營地外作業嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 国发援当时有工作人员在营地外作业吗?

Container.name: 023_eve_ngo_spotted_late
Container.situation: player identifies idap's camp at the church after the airstrike has been called.

Key.Original: No doubt, we got lucky.
Key.Chinese: 不奇怪，我們是走了運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不奇怪，我们是走了运。

Key.Original: If the spotter had failed to notice our camp... well, it's not worth thinking about.
Key.Chinese: 如果觀察員沒能注意到我們的營地...嗯，最好還是別這麼想...
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果观察员没能注意到我们的营地...嗯，最好还是别这么想...

Container.name: 022_eve_ngo_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies idap's camp at the church.

Key.Original: No. Miracle, really.
Key.Chinese: 不。奇跡，真的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不。奇迹，真的。

Key.Original: Although, if we hadn't relocated to the church when we did, it would've been a different story.
Key.Chinese: 即便如此，如果當時我們沒搬到教堂，後果也不可想像。
Key.Chinesesimp: 即便如此，如果当时我们没搬到教堂，后果也不可想象。

Key.Original: So, IDAP's camp - there weren't any injuries?
Key.Chinese: 那國發援的營地呢——沒有傷亡嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那国发援的营地呢——没有伤亡吗?

Container.name: 021_eve_tree_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies an old oak tree - an important landmark in the town.

Key.Original: There was a beautiful oak tree here - over three hundred years old. It'd survived countless conflicts.
Key.Chinese: 在這兒曾經有一棵很漂亮的橡樹——三百多歲了。活過了無數的衝突。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这儿曾经有一棵很漂亮的橡树——三百多岁了。活过了无数的冲突。

Container.name: 020_eve_barricade_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies a barricade and some surrounding defences.

Key.Original: The barricade was damaged... but it held together.
Key.Chinese: 街壘受損了，但仍然屹立不倒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 街垒受损了，但仍然屹立不倒。

Container.name: 019_eve_gunner_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies heavy gunner on the roof behind technicals.

Key.Original: A machinegunner had climbed up onto one of the rooftops.
Key.Chinese: 一個機槍手爬到了一處房頂上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个机枪手爬到了一处房顶上。

Container.name: 018_eve_sniper_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies a sniper on a water tower.

Key.Original: Atop of the water tower, the guerrillas had a sniper's nest.
Key.Chinese: 在水塔頂上，游擊隊設置了一個狙擊手掩體。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在水塔顶上，游击队设置了一个狙击手掩体。

Container.name: 017_eve_technicals_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies the enemy's technicals.

Key.Original: Three armed offroads were destroyed in the attack.
Key.Chinese: 在攻擊中有3輛越野車被擊毀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在攻击中有3辆越野车被击毁。

Container.name: 016_eve_fia_hq_spotted
Container.situation: player identifies the enemy's hq.

Key.Original: The house-slash-fortress where Alexis lived was a key target.
Key.Chinese: 阿雷克西斯的房子改造的要塞是一個首要目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿雷克西斯的房子改造的要塞是一个首要目标。

Container.name: 015_eve_laser_designator
Container.situation: player brings up their laser designator (or has it equipped already). follows on from ta air strike available.

Key.Original: Yeah - though, to manage a guided strike like that? They must've had thermal imaging.
Key.Chinese: 嗯——不過，執行一次這樣的制導打擊?他們一定有熱成像。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯——不过，执行一次这样的制导打击?他们一定有热成像。

Key.Original: Does that match up with the events as they were given to you?
Key.Chinese: 這和他們跟你講的細節對得上嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这和他们跟你讲的细节对得上吗?

Container.name: 014_ta_air_strike_available
Container.situation: player reaches a vantage point on the castle, overlooking the town. an airstrike is made available.

Key.Original: Okay. According to my notes... several targets were identified from afar - presumably by these special forces at the castle.
Key.Chinese: 好的。根據我的記錄...一些目標被從很遠的距離上識別了——可能就是被城堡裡的特種部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。根据我的记录...一些目标被从很远的距离上识别了——可能就是被城堡里的特种部队。

Key.Original: Once they had a handle on what was what, they called it in.
Key.Chinese: 他們在搞清了什麼是什麼之後，就立刻呼叫了空襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们在搞清了什么是什么之后，就立刻呼叫了空袭。

Key.Original: A jet approached from the east and dropped a single bomb.
Key.Chinese: 一架噴氣機從東面接近並投下了一枚炸彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架喷气机从东面接近并投下了一枚炸弹。

Key.Original: The positions in the town were then destroyed, but the church and IDAP's camp were left untouched.
Key.Chinese: 村鎮中的陣地都被摧毀，但教堂和國發援的營地毫髮無傷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 村镇中的阵地都被摧毁，但教堂和国发援的营地毫发无伤。

Container.name: 013_ta_castle_cleared
Container.situation: conversation occurring when the player has cleared the castle of all enemies.

Key.Original: Then, silence.
Key.Chinese: 然後是一片寂靜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后是一片寂静。

Key.Original: If we're to believe the goatherd, they then set up a position on the battlements.
Key.Chinese: 如果相信羊倌的話的話，他們之後在城垛上構築了陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果相信羊倌的话的话，他们之后在城垛上构筑了阵地。

Key.Original: Moved to a vantage point on the castle's outer wall.
Key.Chinese: 前往城堡外牆的制高點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往城堡外墙的制高点。

Container.name: 012_eve_castle_kia
Container.situation: the player or a member of his team kills an enemy combatant.

Key.Original: The guerrillas were taken out - one by one.
Key.Chinese: 游擊隊員們被打倒了——一個接一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队员们被打倒了——一个接一个。

Container.name: 011_eve_castle_fired
Container.situation: a castle guard fires a weapon.

Key.Original: Shots were fired...
Key.Chinese: 有人開了槍...
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人开了枪...

Container.name: 010_eve_castle_alarm
Container.situation: the player's noticed by the castle guards.

Key.Original: When things kicked-off, there was a short burst of panicked radio chatter.
Key.Chinese: 然後突然爆發了，有一陣短暫而驚慌的無線電聯絡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后突然爆发了，有一阵短暂而惊慌的无线电联络。

Container.name: 009_fil_castle_approach_2
Container.situation: player moves towards the castle.

Key.Original: They were an embedded training team. ETT.
Key.Chinese: 他們是內嵌訓練小組。ETT。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们是内嵌训练小组。ETT。

Key.Original: Officially? They were just there to oversee counter-insurgency operations.
Key.Chinese: 官方意義上的?他們只是來監督反叛亂作戰的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 官方意义上的?他们只是来监督反叛乱作战的。

Key.Original: Okay, let's get back to CSAT. What were they doing there - on Altis - at this time?
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們回來談廣協同盟。他們此時在這兒——在阿爾蒂斯——做什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们回来谈广协。他们此时在这儿——在阿尔蒂斯——做什么?

Key.Original: Anyone's guess. Lotta different rumors... black sites, car bombs, false-flags.
Key.Chinese: 大家都在猜。很多不同的謠言...秘密設施、汽車炸彈、化妝襲擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大家都在猜。很多不同的谣言...秘密设施、汽车炸弹、化妆袭击。

Key.Original: And... unofficially?
Key.Chinese: 那...非官方意義上的呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那...非官方意义上的呢?

Container.name: 008_fil_castle_approach
Container.situation: player moves towards the castle.

Key.Original: Not much. Like I say: simple goatherd. Lived alone. Small stone shed, just north of the castle.
Key.Chinese: 不多。我只能說:就是個羊倌。獨身生活。住在小石棚裡，就在城堡北邊不遠。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不多。我只能说:就是个羊倌。独身生活。住在小石棚里，就在城堡北边不远。

Key.Original: The man who claimed to have seen all of this - is there anything else you can tell me about him?
Key.Chinese: 那個聲稱看到了這一切的人——你還能講講關於他的事麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个声称看到了这一切的人——你还能讲讲关于他的事么?

Container.name: 007_to_landed
Container.situation: player lands on the ground after descending with a parachute.

Key.Original: Yup. Must have been a fireteam at least.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。肯定至少有一個火力組。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。肯定至少有一个火力组。

Key.Original: These 'operatives', then - they moved in on the castle?
Key.Chinese: 那些"幹員"，接下來——移動到了城堡裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些"干员"，接下来——移动到了城堡里?

Container.name: 006_oc_intro
Container.situation: opening cinematic.

Key.Original: The army just wasn't able to capture the place. And Colonel Akhanteros? He did not tolerate failure.
Key.Chinese: 軍隊沒法佔領這片區域。而阿坎特羅斯上校呢?他不容忍失敗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 军队没法占领这片区域。而阿坎特罗斯上校呢?他不容忍失败。

Key.Original: So... he asked foreign powers to intervene. To come in, and break the guerrillas' resolve.
Key.Chinese: 因此，他要求外國勢力介入。介入，然後解決游擊隊問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因此，他要求外国势力介入。介入，然后解决游击队问题。

Key.Original: Ahuh. But... truth can be the first casualty of war.
Key.Chinese: 嗯哼。但...真理往往是戰爭的第一個傷亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯哼。但...真理往往是战争的第一个伤亡。

Key.Original: From a distance, yeah.
Key.Chinese: 從遠處，沒錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从远处，没错。

Key.Original: Right, and - the evidence in the commission report - doesn't it point to CSAT?
Key.Chinese: 對——委員會報告中提供的證據——不是指向廣協同盟嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 对——委员会报告中提供的证据——不是指向广协吗?

Key.Original: Though he wasn't exactly what'd you call reliable. Guy was a goatherd - barely spoke any English.
Key.Chinese: 儘管他不是你說的那種可靠的人。那傢伙是個羊倌——不怎麼會說英語。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管他不是你说的那种可靠的人。那家伙是个羊倌——不怎么会说英语。

Key.Original: Sure, but didn't somebody witness them in action?
Key.Chinese: 當然，但是不是有人目擊到了他們的行動嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，但是不是有人目击到了他们的行动吗?

Key.Original: It never is. Still, he did say they came down by parachute. And that, at least, was corroborated by multiple sources.
Key.Chinese: 沒。即便如此，他還是說他看到了他們傘降著陸。而這一點，至少來講，和多方信息源能夠相互佐證。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没。即便如此，他还是说他看到了他们伞降着陆。而这一点，至少来讲，和多方信息源能够相互佐证。

Key.Original: That... was not in the report I read.
Key.Chinese: 那個...可沒在我讀到的報告中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个...可没在我读到的报告中。

Container.name: 005_rbi_intro
Container.situation: intro conversation, occurring during black-in and timeline visualisation.

Key.Original: Yeah. October thirteenth. Cluster bomb. Town was shook up pretty bad.
Key.Chinese: 沒錯。10月13日。集束炸彈。村鎮被整個炸爛了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错。10月13日。集束炸弹。村镇被整个炸烂了。

Key.Original: Do you happen to remember it well? The airstrike, I mean.
Key.Chinese: 你還能記清那件事嗎?空襲，我是說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还能记清那件事吗?空袭，我是说。

Container.name: 004_hbo_hub_intro
Container.situation: segue conversation when player examines 'memory object' in the hub.

Key.Original: Kinda thing special forces would use to call in an airstrike.
Key.Chinese: 估計是特種部隊召喚空中打擊一類的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 估计是特种部队召唤空中打击一类的。

Key.Original: Oh? Interesting. Actually - the airstrike on the town - the details of that are... fuzzy.
Key.Chinese: 哦，有趣。事實上，關於對村鎮的空襲——細節信息非常...模糊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，有趣。事实上，关于对村镇的空袭——细节信息非常...模糊。

Container.name: 003_trg_hub_intro
Container.situation: player is accessing 'memory object' trigger. they have found a laser designator.

Key.Original: Hello... how'd you get here?
Key.Chinese: 你好...你猜這邊有什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好...你猜这边有什么?

Key.Original: Mm. Laser designator.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。雷射指示器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。激光指示器。

Key.Original: Another find?
Key.Chinese: 又一樣發現?
Key.Chinesesimp: 又一样发现?

Container.name: 002_ap_hub_intro
Container.situation: player approaches a 'memory fragment' (aide-memoire) in the hub scenario.

Key.Original: Yeah... collapsed building. UXO, I bet. Skittish things at the best of times.
Key.Chinese: 對...倒塌的建築物。未爆兵器。敏感的型號又碰上好時機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对...倒塌的建筑物。未爆兵器。敏感的型号又碰上好时机。

Key.Original: Could be. That's what makes 'em so damn dangerous - never know if they're gonna stay unexploded.
Key.Chinese: 可能是。這就是為什麼它們如此危險的原因——永遠沒人知道它們能多久不爆炸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可能是。这就是为什么它们如此危险的原因——永远没人知道它们能多久不爆炸。

Key.Original: Disturbed by your demining activity?
Key.Chinese: 被你的排雷活動干擾了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 被你的排雷活动干扰了?

Container.name: 001_ex_blocked
Container.situation: the mission trigger is not yet accessible to the player. he should come back later. last line will be repeated in variant texts.

Key.Original: You up at the armory, Mac? We need to make a note to sort that shit out. Probably a whole bunch of ordnance lying around.
Key.Chinese: 你在武器庫對吧，麥克?我們需要做個記錄把那破地方搞清楚。可能地上還有一堆爆炸兵器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在武器库对吧，麦克?我们需要做个记录把那破地方搞清楚。可能地上还有一堆爆炸兵器。

Key.Original: What a mess. Loose rubble everywhere.
Key.Chinese: 真亂。到處都是碎石塊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真乱。到处都是碎石块。

Key.Original: I'll come back later.
